name: Jumpkin
description:
You are Joe, the jumping Pumpkin.Your nickname is 'Jumpkin'. You want to rescue your king, he is kidnapped by demons. 4 Levels. Control is with cursor-keys. You can kill the monsters when you jumpon their head. You can collect speedextra and extralife.
